schools.title: Augsburg University
schools.subTitle: Health Programs
schools.description: Augsburg University provides a robust, community-focused health sciences education, preparing students for success in a dynamic healthcare landscape.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at Augsburg

schools.title: Emory & Henry College
schools.subTitle: School of Health Sciences
schools.description: Emory & Henry's health programs equip students to provide compassionate, flexible care, addressing the unique health challenges of the Appalachian community.
schools.linkText: Learn about health sciences at Emory & Henry

schools.title: University of Massachusetts Lowell
schools.subTitle: Zuckerberg College of Health Sciences
schools.description: UMass Lowell's health programs, led by experienced faculty, blend innovative research and practical education for licensure-ready, successful healthcare professionals.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at UMass Lowell

schools.title: Immaculata University
schools.subTitle: College of Nursing and Health Professions
schools.description: Immaculata University's health programs combine a strong humanities focus, experiential learning, and individualized mentoring to prepare compassionate, competent healthcare professionals.
schools.linkText: Learn about nursing and health programs at Immaculata

schools.title: D’Youville University
schools.subTitle: Health Programs Across Multiple Schools
schools.description: D’Youville University's health programs are committed to innovative, inclusive education, fostering service, and addressing health disparities to build healthier communities.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at D’Youville

schools.title: Jacksonville University
schools.subTitle: Brooks Rehabilitation College of Healthcare Sciences
schools.description: Jacksonville University's health programs focus on equipping students to provide exemplary care and improve health service delivery in diverse communities.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at Jacksonville

schools.title: The College of New Jersey
schools.subTitle: School of Nursing and Health Sciences
schools.description: TCNJ's health programs emphasize health promotion and integrative wellness, equipping students to improve health outcomes and promote equitable access to care.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at TCNJ

schools.title: Montana State University
schools.subTitle: Division of Health Sciences
schools.description: Montana State University's health programs focus on advancing health education, research, and service to improve well-being statewide. Emphasizing collaboration, they prepare high-quality healthcare providers, educators, and scientists.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at MSU

schools.title: Ithaca College
schools.subTitle: School of Health Sciences and Human Performance
schools.description: Ithaca College's health programs combine classroom learning and hands-on experience, preparing students to promote health and wellness under expert faculty guidance.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at Ithaca College

schools.title: Hood College
schools.subTitle: Health Care Programs
schools.description: Hood College's health care programs, under the Ruth Whitaker Holmes School, offer holistic studies of health, blending liberal arts with practical experiences. Dedicated faculty and community partnerships propel your journey in behavioral and health sciences.
schools.linkText: Learn about health care programs at Hood

schools.title: Goshen College
schools.subTitle: Nursing Programs
schools.description: Goshen's nursing programs emphasize servant leadership, intercultural competency, and innovation - which prepares graduates for a dynamic healthcare landscape.
schools.linkText: Learn about nursing programs at Goshen

schools.title: Bowie State University
schools.subTitle: Healthcare Degrees
schools.description: Bowie State equips students for diverse healthcare careers through hands-on experience, expert faculty, and cutting-edge labs in its state-of-the-art science and nursing center.
schools.linkText: Learn about health programs at Bowie State

schools.title: Mount Carmel College of Nursing
schools.subTitle: Nursing Programs
schools.description: MCCN prioritizes personal growth with student-focused learning, ideal ratios, and cutting-edge resources, cultivating highly competent, dedicated nursing professionals.
schools.linkText: Explore nursing programs at Mount Carmel
